import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'], }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/eventos').subscribe({ next: (response) => (this.eventos = response), error: (error) => console.log(error), }); } }
